category.term: 1743~Britney Spears~The X Factor (TV Show)~Simon Cowell~The Voice (TV Show)
category.label: InformQString

content.div:
Does Britney Spears have the X Factor? Simon Cowell seems to think so, as the Hollywood Reporter claims the singer is currently in final negotiations to join the televised talent competition as a judge.

THR reports Spears' fianc√©/manager, Jason Trawick, is negotiating the deal and could sign a contract as early as next week.

According to Deadline, Spears has been offered $10 million US to join the show, putting her on par with Christina Aguilera's salary for The Voice, and just below the $12 million Jennifer Lopez is earning on this season's American Idol.

Spears would join Cowell and L.A. Reid on the judges' panel, filling one of the seats left by departing judges Paula Abdul and Nicole Scherzinger. On a conference call with reporters a few weeks ago, Cowell indicated that he was looking for two female superstars, but wouldn't confirm rumours he'd approached Spears.

"There's going to be a lot of twists and turns over the next few weeks and a lot of things we're going to announce," he teased.

In a radio interview with Billy Bush last week, Cowell offered more hints, saying he's "fascinated" by Spears.

"The fact that she's one of the most talked about -- not just pop stars but people -- in the world today, means that you've got this star power. This girl has resilience. I would think that if she's managed to sustain a family, a career, which is tough, (The X Factor would be) a walk in the park," he said. "She's still hot, she's still having hit records and she's still controversial. There's a reason for that."

jenm@dose.ca

link.Abstract: Tuesday, Mar. 13 – Fashion Star [NBC, 9:30 p.m. ET] This reality series hosted by Elle Macpherson and featuring Jessica Simpson and Nicole Richie gives unknown designers a chance to launch their collections with major retailers. Every week, the winner of that night's challenge will see their designs on sale the very next day in a leading American retail store, from Saks to H&M.
